member.name: D3D11_STENCIL_OP
member.summary: The stencil operations that can be performed during depth-stencil testing.

member.name: D3D11_STENCIL_OP.D3D11_STENCIL_OP_REPLACE
member.summary: Set the stencil data to the reference value set by calling .

member.name: D3D11_STENCIL_OP.D3D11_STENCIL_OP_INCR_SAT
member.summary: Increment the stencil value by 1, and clamp the result.

member.name: D3D11_STENCIL_OP.D3D11_STENCIL_OP_DECR_SAT
member.summary: Decrement the stencil value by 1, and clamp the result.

member.name: D3D11_STENCIL_OP.D3D11_STENCIL_OP_INCR
member.summary: Increment the stencil value by 1, and wrap the result if necessary.

member.name: D3D11_STENCIL_OP.D3D11_STENCIL_OP_DECR
member.summary: Decrement the stencil value by 1, and wrap the result if necessary.
